item.title: Use Functional Programming In Python
item.description: Although the official python documentation has dedicated an in-depth document on Functional Programming, the community does not consider FP techniques best practice at all times Popular FP related functions have been moved to functools. Still, FP concepts can be very helpful, and in this post I will demonstrate some ‘Functional Programming’-related concepts, using python.
